title: Announcement Cad, "Announcement card for Lindenmeyr Schlosser", 1961
medium: Lithography in orange, green and black ink on green wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted across the center in black: Only 32 days to Christmas
At lower right corner: Lindenmeyr/ Schlosser
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: On the top left is an orange sun and the bottom left is a green snowflake. On the right side, text describing the types of announcements available through Lindenmeyr Schlosser. The company address and phone number are included. Also, the logo, an L and S etched out of an orange rectangle, is included with the company name at the bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement Cad, "Announcement card for Lindenmeyr Schlosser", 1961.
1961. Lithography in orange, green and black ink on green wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-122.
